Here is the list of signs and their scores:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Loyal but impulsive, this sign often struggles to balance its passions with practicality.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and down-to-earth, this sign excels at stability and consistency.
3. Gemini - 6/10 - Curious and adaptable, this sign can be scattered and unpredictable.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Nurturing and emotional, this sign is deeply connected to its intuition and family ties.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, this sign shines with creativity and enthusiasm.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, this sign can be overly critical of itself and others.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, this sign excels at harmony and balance in relationships.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, this sign is deeply intuitive and perceptive.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, this sign can be reckless and impulsive.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, this sign may struggle with emotional expression and self-doubt.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and independent, this sign is innovative and forward-thinking.
12. Pisces - 9/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, this sign excels at understanding the mysteries of life and the universe.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations, not scientific data.
